title: Tottenham v Chelsea: Premier League – live
summary: Scott Murray provides live coverage of an exciting London derby featuring two teams facing challenges with consistency. The match promises high stakes and entertaining moments as both sides vie for improvement. Fans can expect an engaging and action-packed encounter.

title: Ireland v New Zealand: rugby union Test – live
summary: The Irish aim to replicate their shocking 2016 victory at Soldier Field in an upcoming match. Daniel Gallan provides a minute-by-minute report of the event. Fans are eager to see if Ireland can once again triumph.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: week six – live
summary: The Halloween Spooktacular features an eerie mix of soundtracks, including works by Nick Cave and Beethoven, alongside unexpected selections. It's a showcase where performances will range from delightful to potentially disappointing. Audiences are left wondering who will deliver a treat and who might trick them.

title: Breeders’ Cup 2025 horse racing: day two – live
summary: Greg Wood will provide updates on nine additional races, highlighting the Breeders' Cup Classic. Enthusiasts can expect insights and analyses leading up to this prestigious event. Stay tuned for detailed coverage of the races.

title: Unflappable George Ford the safe option for England, Borthwick and brigadier | Andy Bull
summary: The coach has chosen to rely on the steady play of an experienced No 10 instead of selecting riskier options like Fin or Marcus Smith. This decision reflects a preference for stability over unpredictability in team strategy. The move aims to enhance overall performance by leveraging veteran skills.
